The Museum of Art from the Campus

annually under expert supervision.

School. This requirenlcnt. and the introduction of the four-year coursc, placc
the School among the bcst in the country.

participate in football, basketball, baseball and track. With its nc\v location
on thc carrlpus, Dental School participation in University undergraduate activi-
